name: Prototype - IceFox
description:
Another prototype. Inspired by wreckoons. Followed a tiny tutorial by punchesbears to create the bouncy hedge plants.  Modelled the fox in sculptris and rigged it in blender and finally imported into Unity and setup a ragdoll.

The intent was to have the fox slide along, as though on ice and have some obstacles to clear. This is a prototype, very little gameplay thus far.

Should support most game pads - tested with PS4 and PS3
